page.title: 04Transport,Rawreth
page.content: Battlesbridge has a B.R.Station on the Southminster to Wickford line.At Wickford passengers must change if they wish to travel to London.The line carries a shuttle service.20 trains pass through Battlesbridge on weekdays in each direction.They run from 06.05 till 22.32.On Saturdays 11 trains pass through in each direction,from 06.04 till 23.11.Sunday has 8 services in each direction from 08.45 till 20.21. Ticket costs,July 1985,are as follows: to Wickford 50p,to Liverpool St. Â£3.70 to Burnham Â£1.50.Taxi service charges are controlled by Rochford Council, they are:The first 2 minites or 1 mile is 90p.Each additional 1/12 mile or 1 minute is 5p up to a fare of Â£2.70. Each additional 1/18 mile or 40 second is 5p.An extra 30p is charged between 10.00pm and 6.00am.For Christmas and the New Year,charges are doubled.
